tidbits.title: Pearl Diving Legacy
tidbits.description: Bahrain has a rich history in pearl diving, once a major industry. The traditional dhows and the Pearling Path reflect this heritage.

tidbits.title: Modern Architecture
tidbits.description: Bahrain blends tradition with modernity, boasting contemporary architectural marvels like the Bahrain World Trade Center and the iconic Bahrain National Museum.

tidbits.title: Cultural Hub
tidbits.description: Manama, the capital, is a vibrant cultural center, offering a mix of historical sites, bustling souks, and a thriving arts and dining scene.
